Class CompoundAxis

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.input.CompoundAxis
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAxis

    public class CompoundAxis
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAxis
    Axis composed of multiple other axes.
    Author:
    Benny Bobaganoosh (thebennybox@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      CompoundAxis(IAxis[] axes)
      Creates a new axis from a list of axes.

      Creates a new axis from two other axes.

    • Method Detail

      • getAmount

        public double getAmount()
        Description copied from interface: IAxis
        Gets the current value along the axis. -1 is smallest input, 1 is largest input.
        Specified by:
        getAmount in interface IAxis
        Returns:
        The current value of the axis in the range (-1, 1).
